Name: Ancient Wars: Sparta Definitive Edition
About the game: Definitive Edition of Ancient Wars: Sparta using a new improved version of the powerful AWE engine , the best of Ancient Wars: Sparta mechanics and adding a huge list of improvements, new mechanics to create what the RTS fans have been looking for years, getting a game that offers hundred of differents strategics tactics , total player freedom to customize the troops of their civilizations , a huge unit and skill tree , with RPG elements and historically epic moments singleplayer campaigns . All these features will be enhanced by a great multiplayer experience with various game modes as well as a large collection of maps inspired by historical locations to choose for your battles and special maps for competitive multiplayer . The Game The game will feature: Seven playable factions with more than 100 different unit types, 28 heroes, and 90 different weapons and shields. Extended unit customization and reequip system Improved Graphics and Textures Totally new and innovative gameplay, never seen before in an RTS Three single-player campaigns based on events in Ancient History (with 21 missions in total) Single-player & Co-op & Multi-player Great Historical Battles Single-player & Co-op & Multi-player challenge maps Five different game modes (classic skirmish, conquest, domination, survival, and MOBA) New and Competitive Multiplayer Free Updates and DLC Big map collection inspired by ancient world locations Reactive AI whose response depends on your actions as a human player Realistic physics system never seen before in an RTS Weather that affects gameplay Near 200 special abilities for your heroes, special units, wonders, etc Wonders of the ancient world for each civilization Realistic Naval Combat Campaigns and Maps Editor Epic soundtrack inspired by popular film scores. Localization in mutiple languages Militia, Mercenaries, Spies, Uniques Buildings, etc... 4k/8k and 144FPS support
